summary:
My life is full of different schools and experiences. All of them are connected by one aim: learn to make life better, more convenient and easier to understand. 

If you want to influence a civilization — grow people. I think, there may be less problems around the world if there could be someone, one day able to answer someone's question "why" on time. I am experienced in a wide variety of childcare projects and programs created for people of different age groups, as well as having spent time working all around the world. Cultures are different, questions are the same. 

I truly believe that there have to be a good preparation for life and not every school completes it. I'm standing up for individual keys for heart for every kid, every person, everyone needs a unique way for them only to be found. I want to focus on soft skills development by creative expressiveness, self emotional cognition and communication. 

I remember myself in early teens, feeling a need of someone who can lead me through life, inspire and motivate. Therefore, my aim is to become a source of inspiration for someone similar to who I was many years ago. I believe that people are the greatest investment we can make in order to grow wise civilization. 

My lifelong goal is to follow the quote: "be the one, who you needed when you were younger". 
I want to plan, solve and manage. I tend to sacrifice my work for people of different ages, nationalities and preferences to make life better all around.

Creating Area along with Modern Ukrainian Artists, collaboration with main heroes of the event, managing and informing participants, organizing several tutorials with famous national art mentors, face-art, paper technics tutorials and section of painting with oil. Pre- and Post-comunication with participants. Providing informational and technical support during creative fair and workshops. 
Collaboration with decorators and working on self hand made decorations for art area before the festival.

profile_positions.title: FREELANCING ENGLISH TUTORING

profile_positions.description:
- Tailoring my own teaching style in accordance with individual student needs and demonstrating a reflexive approach to teaching. Actively stimulating students for building oral conversations and improvised acting in “real” situations.
- Preparing and delivering educational content and lessons to improve student's language skills. Tracking and reporting on students’ progress. Ensuring effective consolidation of learning material.
- Scheduling lessons and keeping track of in/out payment processes. 
- Multilateral communication on the student-(parent)-teacher path; establishing bonds and expanding the range of the center's operation; constant interaction with multicultural parenting and teaching teams; managing responsibilities and delegating tasks.
profile_positions.title: PRIVATE ENGLISH SCHOOL MANAGING

profile_positions.description:
- Implementing the Finnish model of education in practice.
- Delving into the psychology of children aged 5-10, supporting them during daily school schedule.
- Developing author worksheets and extracurricular activities.
- Crisis intervention and conflict management using the knowledge of non-violent communication.
- Handling multitasking work under deadlines and taking challenges. Cooperation and keeping a high level of professional communication with the teaching team and parents.
profile_positions.title: TEACHING ASSISTANT AND CHILDREN CARE

profile_positions.description:
- Psycho-social support of foreign students in a public secondary school in order to ease student’s general adaptation process.
- Developing an authoring program of language courses, and conducting both individual and team interactional classes.
- Translating various types of school documentation in writing, and multiple spoken translations during meetings to facilitate the language barrier in contact in a school-child-parent relation. Cooperation with a team of teachers and psychologists and parents.
- Conducting individual mentoring and coaching sessions to deal with obstacles of adapting to a new environment, overgoing a language barrier, and improve general social-emotional state.
At work, important features were: self-discipline, initiative and creativity, time management and teamwork, active listening skills, and divisive attention.
profile_positions.title: Intercultural assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Promote students' development from intellectual, physical, and emotional sides. 
- Conducting personal reviews and individual coaching sessions with youth aged 16-21, with a focus on his/her emotional and social state; setting goals for the next period and summarizing the implementation of previous goals.
- Coordinate the work of groups of students during numerous volunteering programs, record results and achievements, and moderate group processes. 
- Develop and conduct the own psychoeducational course. Creation and further control of an individual development plan for each student from a group involved. Run result recording process.
- Analyzing and solving conflicts and critical situations.
profile_positions.title: STUDENT PERSONAL GROWTH MENTORING

profile_positions.description:
I tend to work as a Photographer in different places and organizations all around Europe. Range of my clients might be quite diverse — from volunteering no-profit organization to commercial costumers, willing to get a great result. 
During my work I was developing my skills in few diverse directions. I spent a a lot of time on creating promotional reports of formal/informal events. That were mainly conferences, speeches, panel discussions, workshops and interviews in a small conference room either in a big National stadium or festival stage. This part of my experience might be summarized as event shooting.  
My one more photography passion is creating emotional portraits working outdoor or studio. It involves lightning, creative planing and post production with usage of retouching. 
There are also some video works present in my experience. My working field included creative planing, professional filming and artistic edition of video content according to client briefs.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Photographer&Videographer

profile_positions.description:
- Communicate with clients, guide them through the system troubleshooting process, and further ensure that the issue has been resolved. 
- Provide technical assistance and support in response to incoming requests.
- Report cross-market issues in Latin America.
profile_positions.title: JUNIOR ROLE COORDINATOR

profile_positions.description:
- Setting an authentic foreign environment for language learning in Spanish mountain village Center. 
- Encourage an intense usage of oral language in the classroom, checking pronunciation, building deep conversation and creating high logical dialogs. The main idea was to surround children with real language in real community. 
- Working alongside with native speakers from the USA and Canada, aimed at multilateral development of English language skills for students aged 8 to 17 y.o.
- Looking for individual approaches for each teenager to effectively lead them to speak freely.
- Create a curriculum for lessons, with usage of creative elements for developing fluent "thinking" in a foreign language.  
The theory of language might be taught during lessons, but practice has to be present in every element of their's stay in a camp. We were proactively interacting with students during meal and free time, providing a lot of team-building activities to build a strong community and elements of cultural exchange lessons. We had art and crafts details present in our activities to develop creative thinking, a role-plays, and science experiments to see how does the world work. Students, no matter what age they were - kids or teens - they has to act in front of the camera like professional journalists, running through labyrinths being directed by teammates, creating new inventions, investigating crimes and even learning how to get solar energy - everything in English.
 The main advantage of the position for me as a teacher was having a huge field for developing communication and soft skills in all levels. When you are trying to explain the same thong for different children in a hundred different ways as their levels of language might be completely different - that might be yet an adventure!
profile_positions.title: English Language Instructor

profile_positions.description:
Dolphin school is a private English school situated in a neighbor province next to Hanoi. It is specialized on creative teaching for children of different age groups. School is also providing online access to lessons in few language levels. 
I was committed to give lessons for young children and adults with usage of Skype and supporting materials. Lessons, I was providing were designed both for personal and group teaching for students from Elementary up to Advanced level.
profile_positions.title: Online Tutor

company.name: Popodoo Smart English Tx Phu Tho

profile_positions.description:
- Creating an excellent foreign environment to speak English for lovely children aged 3-15 y.o.
- Planing and running workshops and outdoor activities based on own authorial curriculum with active usage of English.
- Educating Vietnamese teachers on behalf with a school. Multilateral collaboration with Vietnamese professional teachers.
- Oral-centered learning of language. Conducting individual interviews with students, reporting progress of each individual.
- Conducting open lessons in public schools of a region.
- Giving online group lessons for adults in business field.
My main responsibility in Popodoo school was to share passion of learning English with children from kindergartens, primary schools and secondary schools. I was responsible for organization of extra-curricular activities and events related with Vietnamese and Western culture. It was empowered to enhance creativity in designing and delivering lessons to students. Therefore, I worked on improving supportive materials and supplies for children to make it the most personalized version for every individual as one. Lessons, I was providing for children of different age groups were designed for students from Beginner up to Advanced levels. Every class was aimed to improve both oral and written language, each of them included theoretical (grammar) and practical (usage) part. 
I had an opportunity to experience Vietnameese typical educational curriculum and customize it with personal approaches. Also, to share my own experience and educate local teachers.
profile_positions.title: English Language Teacher

volunteer_experiences.description: I assist preparation during TEDxKyiv event "Celebrating troubles", with participation of main national famous speakers. I assisted speakers directly, helped them in a backstage, prepared stage for performance, controlled translating headphones translation during event.

I was committed to become a body for arriving student due to exchange program in University. Therefore, I was helping with accommodation, translation and documentary problems for new participants. My role was to make students' adaptation process as easy as possible. That meant a lot of communication between us, sharing information, critical thinking and fast reaction, problem solving. One of the most challenging aspect for most of arrivals was cultural difference, as far as students, that we were ready to host, were arriving from all around the world. 
Also I was helping during a research of international opportunities, following up the right youth talent, exchanging international experience, activating and developing youth leadership, helping out with intercultural adaptation, managing participants, communicating. 
With a time, I was taking part in few exchange programs by myself. It helped me to discover all the difficulties that arriving people might experience, so I could find the best solution.

volunteer_experiences.role: Translator, volunteer in a seventh edition of the Wrocław Global Forum
volunteer_experiences.description: My main role was greeting, accompaniment, communication, also selecting and transferring information between speakers and guests of the event. I was a public translator, efficiently communicating with participants and organizers of the conference during event.

I was responsible for organisation of Art area during Youth Day in Kyiv. I was seeking for art representatives, painters and craft makers, collaborating with decorators, where each of them has to run  a distinct workshops. I was committed to manage volunteers working during the festival on our art area.
Each of them got own responsibilities to accomplish on tome in specific place due to specially created pans, which I've designed.

Our main role was spreading culture and traditions between guests and visitors. We were shaping open, dynamic and friendly space to present and promote diversity and multicultural environment. 
I was cooperating with organizers of various events, helping and working both in a group and by myself. I was  involved in the current activities, like decorating spaces, communicating with speakers, marketing and information managing. 
I was responsible for simultaneous translating during online transmission with Ukrainian author and journalist.  I was committed to operate in many levels and finding myself in almost every situation.

I took care of international students coming to our University for an exchange program to gain new experience. My main responsibilities included spreading information between foreigners, improving a language level, helping out with daily routine and solving out cultural differences. It gave me a great possibility for rising up a communication level on different stages. It often meant dealing with a lot of challenges, investigating types od personalities and looking for a key to each of them, individualizing information. The best part of all was experience and cultural exchange - I could try a priceless possibility to travel even without leaving a country.

As a videographer, I am responsible for the production - filming of concerts and events, and transformation the raw video material into engaging videos. As far as this organization is world spreaded,  I work under the auspices of it in different cities all around the world.

In different stages I used to be involved in all steps of the process, from creating the concept to finishing videos. My core focus is on:
PRE-production
filming
lightning
equipment choice
stabilization
conceptualizing
Also, 
Assembly video during POST-production
Editing raw audio/video footage
Creation of intro/outro scenes
Music, speech and scene synchronization
Adding visual effects
Subtitle creation

I meet and host people all around the world. I am committed to help them, I love cooking for them and providing all they need to make their stay really cozy and inspiring. I participated Couchsurfing project both as a host and as traveler as well. I tend to proclaim and prosper specific Couchsurfing culture between people, which says: Exchange experiences, give, shat you have and give what you're given, share. No money - just open up. I'm proud of being an ongoing participant!

Volunteering during this music festival was aimed for greeting and accompanying guests of the festival. Our second additional responsibility was keeping the nature cleanliness of the area, where the all performing was ongoing. Big cleanup allowed us to keep nature pure and undamaged.

I helped in greeting and security on check board. Good knowledge of English gave a perfect opportunity of the efficient communication with invited guests and participants and accompanying them during all the festival.
Providing technical and informational support for participants, coordinating and introducing information. Managing staff in a bar team.
